    • Method Detail

      • getApplicationFacadeInstance

        public static ApplicationFacadeInterface getApplicationFacadeInstance()
        Gets the application facade instance. If the application facade is not created, it will create one.
        Returns:
        the application facade instance

      • createTestOffer

        public static Offer createTestOffer(RuralHouse ruralHouse,
                                    java.util.Date firstDay,
                                    java.util.Date lastDay,
                                    double price)
        Create and return an offer

        Assumes that the created offer will not be null and that the offer will not throw any exceptions.
        If the assumption fails, the test that calls the function will also fail.

        Parameters:
        ruralHouse - the rural house associated to the offer
        firstDay - the start date of the offer
        lastDay - the end date of the offer
        price - the offer price per day
        Returns:
        the created Offer

      • parseToDate

        public static java.util.Date parseToDate(java.time.LocalDate localDate)
        Parse java.util.Date to java.time.LocalDate.

        Assumes that the parsed value will not be null and that the parse will not throw any exceptions.
        If the assumption fails, the test that calls the function will also fail.

        Parameters:
        localDate - value to parse
        Returns:
        The date in java.util.Date type

      • getFailMessage

        public static java.lang.String getFailMessage(java.lang.Exception e,
                                              org.junit.jupiter.api.TestInfo testInfo)
        Returns a formated error message with the exception information.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception
        testInfo - the TestInfo used, to inject information about the current test
        Returns:
        the formatted fail message
